children.comment: Pfft, coming from Woody Harrelson, that's pretty damn rich.
http://i.imgur.com/X75DGFa.gif
Well, good job then.
You're still trying to troll? I beat you like 2 minutes ago. What are you doing?
I'm not, and if you cannot reconcile these concepts together, you may be too stupid for this conversation.
I was just going off of what you said, I guess you're retracting your statement? That's fine. Glad we cleared that up.
Are you familiar with the concept of rhetoric? Speaking of dumbing down shit for children...
You said that the AFV is not AFV anymore because Bob doesn't host it, what did you mean by that then? :)
If you believe that I was implying that, you're probably more of an idiot than most children.
Ok, I will word it for a child "If the host of a show changes, are you saying it stops being that show" there, easier for you to understand?
I also didn't mention Doctor Who. You want a tangent, you'll fucking get one.
That wasn't what I asked you.
I'm implying Doctor Who is a low-tier sci-fi series that no self-respecting sci-fi enthusiast would be a fan of.
Are you implying that Doctor Who stops being doctor who when the doctor regenerates?
Yeah, if you're some idiot kid who doesn't know who Bob Saget is.
Same thing.
No, AFHV was.
